values: Dust begins to fall, to the ground The air is cold and thin Thoughts are haunting me as I look around This will never end and I'll bleed forever Don't acknowledge right, just dwell on wrong This spot in hell is where I belong I've come so far - it's been so long Don't know why it started or where it came from Outside shell is strong - confident But slowly eats away Like a man plagued with disease, I try to fight Through my pores it seems to seep... I'll bleed forever And you sit there and do nothing You're content with doing nothing There's nowhere to run and hide when you're living to die Stuck alone inside your head, better off dead The phone would ring in the empty house, no one's around. But in my life, I wanted more, I needed more I taste more

Two nights ago I was shot
A bullet sunk straight through my skull
A friend pulled the trigger that silenced me
No pain as I awoke, but dead
Seeing the face of the man
The time as he lays down his gun
I knew this was going to take place
White silence, so peaceful, so numb

No one knows the time they're changing
No one will see through:

You're all gone to me, (gone to me)
I've been pulled out to watch from my eternal sleep
Intuition and a warning to believe (I will believe)
Something was wrong and though I felt I had to stay
Moving on seemed to be somber bliss
Without one goodbye
I watch my Mother shed tears
(and taste the blood she cries
and taste the blood she cries)

No:This gun has stopped time in its tracks
Has altered the course of my fate
Destiny is shattered and timeless
Closed eyes feel the cold winds embrace

I'll watch you call, calling for me,
you can't bring back time...
Close your eyes or look away,
fate exposed and won't let me stay
Hope will fall tonight with broken wings,
descending entity in me

My voice has been taken from me.
The more I listen, the more I have to say

The bullet:
"I've got a crush on a pretty pistol
should I tell her that I feel this way?
Father told us to be faithful
I've got a crush on a pretty pistol 
should I tell her that I feel this way
I've got love songs in my head killing us away"


The Father:

guns?" (yeah)
"god?"
(yeah)
"your government?"

guns?"
(yeah)

(yeah)

(fuck yeah)

The bullet:
"I've got love songs in my head killing us away
got love songs in my head killing us away
She tells me I'm a pretty bullet
I'm gonna be a star someday
Mother says that we should look away
She tells me I'm a pretty bullet
an Imitation Christ
I've got love songs in my head
that are killing us away"


The Father:
"do you love your
guns?"
(yeah)
"god?"
(yeah)

(fuck yeah)

nothing ever changes in this world patterns form. we like to mix it up sometimes. people die. new pieces are formed. split in differnt directions. some of us can only follow orders. WE ARE WEAKLINGS POWERLESS new borders are formed new laws are made they are broken and torn down. we rebuild or is it nothing but distruction? i find myself asking the same questions again. what is my purpose? what do i do next? where is this taking me? no one seems to asnwer. do you have a cigiarette i can bum? i can feel me growing towards cancer with every hit. -Jon Murphy in loving memory of blow capone and his siblings

i sit and stare. i sit and stare. i sit and stare. i sit and stare. what has become of me? nothing is the way i thought it would be. i think i have started to enjoy my life again. it kinda worries me. all i know is that i can't fuck this up. who would have known? who would of known that something like this could hit me so hard. can't you see my heart is yours? be gentle there is not much of it left. all i had was my ego and i find it fading. i think this is what i needed. love, Jon Murphy

Wouldn't it be nice if we were older
Then we wouldn't have to wait so long
And wouldn't it be nice to live together
In the kind of world where we belong

You know it's gonna make it that much better
When we can say goodnight and stay together

Wouldn't it be nice if we could wake up
In the morning when the day is new
And after having spent the day together
Hold each other close the whole night through

Happy times together we've been spending
I wish that every kiss was never ending
Wouldn't it be nice

Maybe if we think and wish and hope and pray
It might come true
Baby then there wouldn't be a single thing we couldn't do
We could be married
And then we'd be happy
Wouldn't it be nice

You know it seems the more we talk about it
It only makes it worse to live without it
But let's talk about it
Wouldn't it be nice

just look at what you've created.


LIKE IT OR NOT.

you're apart of this.
As we wait here for a sign. we are greeted by the end of time, these aren't streets paved with gold. you are my everything, my soul is growing cold.

grab the gun. pull the trigger. if only things were that easy. life is worse than any death. we stand and watch our brothers die in a useless war. TOTALITARIAN NATION if "he" had his way that is. there is no light at the end of the tunnel. only this. only fear. only pain. only torture. only death. NO SALVATION. NO SAVIOR IN ME. time for god to pray that his book comes true. disgusted, Jon Murphy

unpredictable, loyal, asshole, loves to be loved but rarely shows love,cold hearted,
caring, fucking crazy, social but antisocial, loves a challenge, loves women, loves sex,.
loves to cuddle, bash your fucking face in, comfort you while your in pain, loves to 
fight, hates to be alone, loves to be alone, likes to disorganize life as much as possible,
wild, unsafe but safe, no bullshit, shows little emotion, if you hurt me youd never know,
uses words as a weapon frequently, loves to sing even though not good at it, 
loves your hatred, loves attention but doesn't need it, could be poor and live happily, 
matterial things mean very little, passion for music, loves to write, hates conformity, 
loves fashion, egotistical, shallow yet accepting, loves art of any kind, loves to laugh,
never cries, loves to eat, loves to talk for hours, loves to learn, smartass, hates attority,
open minded, loves to listen, hates ignorance, sarcastic, brutally honest, strong, 
not good with relationships, affraid of comitment but tries hard, gets bored easily,
hyper, on edge alot, overly paranoid about things, assumes either the best or the worst,
protective, extremly proud, loves confrontation, compasionate, horrilbly mean,
doesnt care about you or will die for you, extremely arrogant, loves to kill time with 
"family", cocky, can't find room for god, convincing, pesimistic, trusting is hard,
your best friend, your worst enemy, overcritical, loves drugs, enjoys pain, hates pain,

alive or dead? im still breathing, but im cold where do i go for help? i look inside. i look outside. i see nothing but an endless void of nothing. we fell apart together. we build ourselves back together. we live then we die. or do we just die? another day passes; a million lives in an instant. a million screaming christians can't be wrong. (subconciously) someone please help me i think my heart is going to explode! wait i think ill just die. why keep the devil waiting any longer? (conciously) i think i'll just take one more line then im done. of course nothing ever turns out how you want it. you can take my life, but you can't take my death. i wait paintently for the end. do what you will. with my best regards, Jon Murphy(for a limited time only)
